MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold affecting properties in Afonwen and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:14am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by10:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:52am on 2nd November 2020
